step.context: \text{What possible orders can a matrix containing}\\ 18 \text{ elements have?}
step.reason: \text{The set of ordered pair of natural numbers}\\ \text{whose product is }18 , \text{ gives the possible orders.}

step.context: \text{What possible orders can a matrix containing}\\ 5 \text{ elements have?}
step.reason: \text{The set of ordered pair of natural numbers}\\ \text{whose product is }5 , \text{ gives the possible orders.}
